name: Munch - Temple Treasure Hunt
description:
Exercise your mind while enjoying the most adventurous game "Munch - Temple Treasure Hunt". Use your intelligence to open the ancient temple doors and pass through the levels. Stay calm and maintain your focus level! "Munch" is an adventurous game filled with surprising challenges and other power boosters. Identify the right door and solve the riddle correctly to get through the next door. Remember each opened door could be your last door and you might have to start all over again. Based on a perfect mysterious storyline the game is designed with thrilling sound effects and antique user interface.

    The amazing game "Munch" is waiting for you to collect its hidden treasure behind the doors which will be opened only with your intelligence. The game is perfect for those who want to improve their logical reasoning skills with complete fun and adventure. Play the game to relieve your stress. This mind exercising game will keep you away from all the mental pressure and revive your energy.

    Buckle up and brush your logical thinking skills to unlock all the doors of the ancient temple to reach to the hidden treasure. Beware of the unexpected challenges that come along your way. The game comes up with 2 modes of playing namely Story Mode and Challenge Mode to add on more fun. While the Story Modes are beautifully illustrated over 25 challenging levels, Challenge Mode is completely customizable to increase the level of difficulty and adventure. Download the adventurous game of the era "Munch - Temple Treasure Hunt" to enjoy the thriller.!

    We are constantly working hard on making the “Munch - Temple Treasure Hunt” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “Munch - Temple Treasure Hunt” game, do not forget to rate us!
